titleStmt.title: An apology for the innocency and justice of the Quakers cause And a short elucidation of their principles. With some reflections upon J. Ives his papers. Written in the behalf of the Christian religion. By William Salmon professor of physick.
titleStmt.author: Salmon, William, 1644-1713.

notesStmt.note: In partial response to Jeremy Ives and his several works against Quakers.
Reproduction of the original in the Friends' House Library, London.
